channel.title: [delta] prayer
channel.description:
dear moparscapers,
[s]When i turn on my prayers it won't drain any prayer. It just keeps the level u have, so u can't run out of prayer points. How can i make it that it drains, so u lose prayer points?[/s]
I got my prayer tab( where all prayers are turnable) and on the bottom there stands 99/99 but that number doesn't change how can i change this?
thanks, halflive9

item.title: [delta] prayer
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

dear moparscapers,

When i turn on my prayers it won’t drain any prayer. It just keeps the level u have, so u can’t run out of prayer points. How can i make it that it drains, so u lose prayer points?

I got my prayer tab( where all prayers are turnable) and on the bottom there stands 99/99 but that number doesn’t change how can i change this?

thanks,
halflive9
